# dataRepresentation()

**Instance Method**

Returns a representation of the document as an `NSData` object.

## Declaration

```swift
func dataRepresentation() -> Data?
```

## Related Documentation

- **write(toFile:)**: Writes the document to a file at the specified path.
- **write(to:)**: Writes the document to a location specified by the passed-in URL.

## Creating Data Representations

- **dataRepresentation(options:)**: Returns a representation of the document as an `NSData` object with additional options applied, such as filters.

items.description: Writes the document to a file at the specified path.
items.name: write(toFile:)

items.description: Writes the document to a location specified by the passed-in URL.
items.name: write(to:)

items.description: Returns a representation of the document as an `NSData` object with additional options applied, such as filters.
